titleStmt.title: The hvmble and ivst remonstrance of the knights, citizens and burgesses in Parliament assembled in Jreland
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
At head of text: To the Right Honovrable, the Lord Deputie [Robert, Earl of Leicester].
